name: Space Frog
description:
Space Frogs - a game for GameMaker Toolkit Jam
Your ship has been breached by Evil Space Jellyfish, You are quickly running out of O2 you must open to the door to escape doom. The only tool you have is your tongue, but to use it you must sacrifice O2... can you survive?

Controls
A & D  to move Left and Right
Space to Jump
Left click to use you tongue

NOTE: there will mostly be a few bugs that i did not have time to fix 
ESC- can restart the game (Just in Case) 

This game is playable in the browser, and there is also a windows executable using NW.js

The game was created using Pyxel Edit and Construct3, To convert some audio files I also used Audacity.

All programming and Art was done by Armando Alonso (@piranha_305) 
The Only Music track was created by Visager Music (@visagermusic)
And the SFX were downloaded from http://soundbible.com/
